scripts.install-all: npm run install-api & npm run install-ui & wait
scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run copy-dist && npm run start-api
scripts.upload: npm run build && aws s3 cp ui/dist s3://local-emailer/ --recursive --profile personal
scripts.package: aws cloudformation package --template ./deployment.yml --s3-bucket deployments --output-template packaged-sam.yml --profile personal
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file packaged-sam.yml --stack-name local-emailer --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --profile personal
scripts.package-deploy: npm run package && npm run deploy
